# ReplaceTextOptions.FromLeftMarginToNextElement property

Gets a default replace text options, sets strategy as left margin position to next element.

```csharp
public static ReplaceTextOptions FromLeftMarginToNextElement { get; }
```

## Property Value

A [`ReplaceTextOptions`](../ReplaceTextOptions.md) instance that contains the default value of replace text options.
